body.name: JOUNIVO Computer Speakers, RGB PC Speaker for Gaming,32W Bluetooth HiFi Computer Speaker for Desktop,Speakers with 3.5mm Aux Wired and Touch pad Control for PC Laptop Monitor,Tablet,Phone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 23 hrs 26 mins
features: ♪【Hi-Fi Sound Quality】 Dual drivers & Dual diaphragms provide perfect performance of high-pitch and deep bass. Even at maximum volume, the treble part is not distorted and the bass part remains mellow at all times. Offers you superior auditory feast.
♪【Dynamic RGB Lighting】 The colorful RGB lighting effects aim to elevate your gaming experience by dressing your desktop and room into a spectrum style.

♪【4 Equalizer Modes】This Gaming Speakers Includes an advanced EQ chip that brings diverse sound, built-in 4 equalizer options: Music / Game / News / Movie, for multiple usage and outstanding sound effect.
♪【Plug & Play for Broad Compatibility】Can be connected via USB/Bluetooth 5.0 and 3.5 mm AUX-in connection,for seamless plug-and-play installation
♪【Easy-access Control】The touch pad control features a unique design. It easy and accurate controls all functions .

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 32 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sound for smaller speakers
reviews.reviewText: Much better sound than the stock PC speakers. The remote is handy, but has a very short cord. The LED lights are interesting, but distracting. They can be turned off by holding down the RGB button. Bluetooth connection is handy, but delayed. Great for music, but not for videos. Changed PC connection to the 3.5mm cord. Which is also very short, only 3 feet long. Overall, decent speakers with some shortcomings (as in short cords).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Giant Speakers that buzz
reviews.reviewText: I was so disappointed with the size of these speakers and they had already been opened too. The sound was okay with a buzzing sound which is a definite "no" in my book. I sent them back immediately. I'm going to splurge and order the Edifier G2000's. You get what you pay for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good bang for buck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product had an amazing sound output for its size and had very nice controls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars SUPER annoying and loud voice prompts!!! Can't turn them down! Bluetooth pairing doesn't work.
reviews.reviewText: These are great sounding speakers when you have music going through them. Surprisingly good! Very balanced sound. I really want to like them, but.......WOW the voice prompts are HORRIBLE!!! There is no way to turn them down or off, so every time you change mode, you hear an unintelligible voice in broken English saying what "mood" you are in. There are 4 modes and I can only understand the voice for two of them. The bigger deal is that the voice is LOUD and you cannot disable it, nor turn it down. You could have the speaker volume ALL THE WAY DOWN and that awful voice still yells at you.These speakers have so much wasted potential. I really love how they sound, but I can't really get past the terrible voice prompts and random sounds they make.I could not get bluetooth pairing to work at all. I had to plug these in to my computer via USB to use them.One last thing, these are not brand specific. There is no brand on the box at all. So, these are likely a generic speaker set that is sold on that one marketplace that I can't mention. Not that its a bad thing, just realize you are buying some generic speakers.Overall, I can't recommend these...especially if you plan to use them with little ones sleeping in the house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set of computer speakers with good sound, nice controls, and lighting.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These computer speakers brought to you by Jounivo provide very good sound, lighting and controls, but are limited on their max volume. Probably not the best choice if you want to play loud music, but great for everything else.What I like:• This is a very nice set of computer speakers that perform very well overall. I would put them in the mid-high level on performance and value.• The center control unit is handy and nice to have. It works well and gives you most of the controls you would want.• The sound quality is very good for the size, can get mildly loud for computer speakers, but the performance falls off quick at the top. I would’ve expected them to achieve a higher top volume for their current asking price of $79.99 USD, but it’s still very good.• The lighting is fun and has many settings to add to their value.• The EQ settings also work well and perform like everything else in a higher middle range.• Not that you will touch the speakers often, but they have the soft touch feeling to the plastic and I love it.• It’s very useful that you can use Bluetooth, USB, Or 3.5mm Aux.Overall, I’m very pleased with this set of speakers, they are easy to set-up, user friendly, have good solid sound, and have a great way to control the action. Despite its lack of super high volume, it’s still provided a great experience while gaming or watching videos.If you want to see them in action and close-up watch my included video in full screen.I hope you found this information to be helpful in your decision.
